title: Nicki Minaj & Meek Mill Have Officially Broken Up
text:
2 
With one of her first tweets of 2017, Queens rapper Nicki Minaj has confirmed that she is no longer in a relationship with Meek Mill . Nicki added that she‚Äôs focused on her work, which fans may get a preview of in the very near future. 
‚ÄúTo confirm, yes I am single. Focusing on my work & looking forward to sharing it with you guys really soon. Have a blessed New Year. Love u,‚Äù Nicki Minaj tweeted earlier today (January 5).
